title: Electron transfer at the heterojunction interface of CoP/MoS2 for efficient electrocatalytic hydrogen evolution reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19294-19300
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02712D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lili Zhang, Aijiao Xu, Xinxing Shi, Huanhuan Zhang, Zongpeng Wang, Shijie Shen, Jitang Zhang, Wenwu Zhong
The CoP/MoS2 heterojunction was prepared for efficient electrocatalytic hydrogen evolution reaction. It has superior performance compared to the sulfide heterojunction Co9S8/MoS2 and the phosphide heterojunction CoP/CoMoP2.
